items.name: Kill Aura
items.desc: Automatically attack nearby players when you have the knife.

items.name: Silent Stab
items.desc: Perform stealth kills that avoid typical alerts.

items.name: Aim Assist
items.desc: Assist aiming to land shots on the murderer with higher accuracy.

items.name: Auto Sheriff
items.desc: Automatically equip and use the sheriff when available.

items.name: Auto Cash
items.desc: Collect in-game currency and rewards automatically over time.

items.name: Auto Wins
items.desc: Automate actions that increase win rate for grinding.

items.name: Player Fling
items.desc: Apply force to fling targeted players away.

items.name: Explosion Fling
items.desc: Create controlled explosions that throw nearby players.

items.name: ESP
items.desc: Highlight players, items, and roles through walls.

items.name: No Fog
items.desc: Remove fog and visual obstructions for clearer view.

items.name: Time Scale
items.desc: Adjust global time scale to speed up or slow down rounds.

items.name: Performance Mode
items.desc: Reduce visual effects to improve FPS.

items.name: Auto-Respawn
items.desc: Automatically respawn and rejoin rounds when possible.

items.name: Speed
items.desc: Increase movement speed with smooth controls.
